name: Talk_Civ3
_source: speak;Ephraim;May I talk to you for a minute, sir.|You mentioned about a strange man looking for a girl with indigo hair.|This strange man you mentioned...what was he like?

speak;Villager Man;Odd fellow, but polite enough.|Wore robes like some kind of sage or shaman.|Had this calm way about him, like nothing could rattle him.|Spoke with an accent I didn't recognize.|Foreign, maybe from across the sands?
speak;Ephraim;And he was searching for someone with indigo hair?|Did he mention any other features?
speak;Villager Man;He only mentioned the hair.|Seemed pretty determined to find her, though.|Wonder if their paths ever crossed.
speak;Ephraim;I see...Thank you for the information.
